model.description: The model number of the device

channel_type.description: The channel type code for channel the device can be connected to

sensor_type.description: The sensor type code for the sensor

effector_type.description: The effector type code for the effector

serial_number.description: The the serial number for the device

max_valid_reading.description: The maximum valid reading from the sensor (expressed in sensor units)

min_valid_reading.description: The minimum valid reading from the sensor (expressed in sensor units)

accuracy.description: The absolulte accuracy of the sensor (expressed in sensor units)

precision.description: The precision of the effector (expressed in effector output units)

max_valid_setting.description: The maximum valid setting for the effector (expressed in effector units)

min_valid_setting.description: The minimum valid setting for the effector (expressed in effector units)
